amendment.description: Amendment requires State entities to report on how they have worked with funded charter schools to foster community involvement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 113-444 to require State entities to report on how they have worked with funded charter schools to foster community involvement.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
